title: Peloton’s ‘Worst-Kept Secret’ Is Out (Yes, It’s a Rowing Machine)
content: Plus: The iPod is dead, iPhones might go USB-C, folding screens get bendier, and a beloved music synthesizer gets an upgrade.
description: Plus: The iPod is dead, iPhones might go USB-C, folding screens get bendier, and a beloved music synthesizer gets an upgrade.
